content.rendered:
What is the Piklist Beta Program?

We always have new products in the pipeline. The Piklist Beta Program lets you take part in shaping them by test-driving pre-release versions and letting us know what you think. Your comments will help us make them better for everyone.

How can I signup?

When you view a product that is in Beta, you will see a form. Just fill it out and submit. When the beta software is ready for testing, you’ll receive an email with an activation code that will allow you to download and install it. Then go ahead and start using it.

What should I do after I install the product?

Use it and provide us feedback. We want to hear from you. Do you like the way it works? Is it missing any features? Did you just find a bug?

When you come across any of these issues, please report it on our support forums. We have special forums setup for Beta users.

Can I use Beta’s on live sites?

Absolutely not. Beta’s are not guaranteed to work 100%, and we may also change the way they work and store data, so only use on Test or Development sites. It is very important that you do not use beta’s on live sites.
